Building the Digital Spine of Africa

About Africa Railways

Modernizing African rail travel through blockchain technology, digital payments, and real-time operations management.

Africoin Wallet: Your Digital Companion

Welcome to the future of African rail travel. The Africoin Wallet is the official digital payment and logistics platform connecting passengers, workers, and shippers across Africa's railway network.

Our Mission

Built on state-of-the-art blockchain technology, Africoin is designed to modernize Africa's most strategic railways. Our mission is to enhance safety, improve reliability, and provide financial inclusion for every traveler and worker across the continent's rail network.

1,860km Dar-Kapiri Corridor
54 African Nations
